Summary: Two orange balls and specks of white light around randomly then ascending obj had rotating lights
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Wilmington
There were no other sightings in Wilmington on or around September 19th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was merging right onto I495S exit at 10:30pm and as I was pulling up to my merge I noticed this huge star. I thought to myself "look how big that star is". Just as I merged onto the highway I noticed a second star further down from the first one but smaller. I then thought to myself "oh I wonder if these are planets". The stars were an orange color. As I continued to drive I saw smaller white round lights that "speckled" randomly around and between the two orange "stars". As I continued going southbound the lights were starting to be to my left peripheral view and that's when I saw rotating blue, white, orange lights. These lights rotated at least three times and I saw it slightly ascend at least three times. That's when I pulled over to see this object carefully when I noticed that it was gone. I looked at the time and it was exactly 10:37pm.
